SEARCH
Module BrickBreaker
Package breakout.core.database

Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.database.QueryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultDependenciesInjectable, Queryable
public class QueryBuilder extends Object implements DefaultDependenciesInjectable, Queryable
Refactored mainly from the LoadSave class.
See Also:
  • Original LoadSave Class This class builds the query making respective files in the local acting as a database. This class is mainly tailored to database migration in the future, whereby only small changes are required.
